title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, making them look like user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which makes them stand out even more.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should not use text fields on motif platforms. The design should be consistent with the appearance on Windows, where the text fields do not have automatic borders and the backgrounds are not different colored.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a Project. 
2. Right-click and choose Properties. 
3. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.)
